trans-unit.source: Represents an object that identifies an item of content.
Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifies a data item through an ordered list of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements.
Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifies a data item through a set of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements.
Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref>.
This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
For convenience, Clone shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.

The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.` When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
A modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref>.
